description:
Ten years after the Bubble War, the dichotomy between the rich and the poor in the world becomes more prominent and Japan is no exception. The rich seek to satisfy their desires and derive pleasure for themselves, and Tokyo has materialised into such a city as a result.
http://anidb.net/ch20023 [Saiga Tatsumi], once a war photographer, works for http://anidb.net/ch19916 [Ginza Hibari] in the capitalist state of Tokyo. He infiltrates the Roppongi Club, a secretive base located in the red district area of the city, to collect information. However, he was caught in the process and brought forward to a girl called http://anidb.net/ch20024 [Kagura] who was in the midst of a ritual. His contact with Kagura awakens his special ability: the power to make things explode when photographed. In order to unravel the mystery behind the Roppongi Club and Kagura, Saiga begins his solitary struggle.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
When Saiga infiltrates a secret pleasure-club for Tokyo’s elite, he will ignite a chain of events that could force the entire ruling class to their knees.
Source: crunchyroll

Kagura’s haunted by nightmares where she participates in twisted rituals, playing the part of a powerful Divine Goddess. Unbeknownst to her, the terrifying visions are far from imaginary.
Source: crunchyroll

During a depraved ceremony beneath Tokyo, a kiss from Kagura gives Saiga the strange power to use his camera as a weapon. Can he rescue the Divine Goddess and get them to the surface alive?
Source: crunchyroll

When Saiga slips under Suitengu’s nose to free Kagura, her captor is not pleased. He sends Shirogane to ensnare Saiga in a deadly dance under the night’s sky.
Source: crunchyroll

Saiga hides Kagura at a seedy nightclub. Meanwhile, another Euphoric hunts for the girl: Madam Koganei, a high-class woman who fuels her power by swallowing diamonds.
Source: crunchyroll

Madam Koganei seems impervious to Saiga’s attacks. Not only is she virtually unbreakable, but the diamond’s reflective quality makes it impossible for Saiga’s camera to focus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよならダイヤモンド夫人

REGULAR.description:
Saiga and Kagura visit Doctor Ryogoku, hoping he can find a medical explanation for the strange Euphoric powers. As Saiga gets lost in disturbing memories of war, the doctor makes a startling diagnosis!
Source: crunchyroll

With Kagura’s health failing, an unexpected house call from the demented Dentist is the last thing Saiga needs. The photographer will have to perfect his shooting skills to pass this sadistic drill.
Source: crunchyroll

Saiga and Kagura visit a remote spa, where Kagura learns some shocking truths about her origins. But the most startling revelation is a glimpse into the human side of powerful Shinsen.
Source: crunchyroll

Saiga and Kagura’s search of an abandoned research lab is interrupted by Suitengu. Back in the city, Ginza makes a shady pact with Kagura’s mother and prepares to join the party.
Source: crunchyroll

Saiga falls unconscious into Ginza’s hands after telling her where Kagura is hiding. The rogue cop will stop at nothing to claim Saiga as her own  - even if it means turning Kagura over to the enemy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mutter liegt im Sterben, komm sofort zurück
Ta mère est mourante, reviens immédiatement
Tua madre è in agonia, torna subito a casa
ハハキトク スグカエレ

REGULAR.description:
Suitengu is on the verge of taking control of the Tennozu Group by marrying Shinsen. Kagura must break out of the floating research facility and warn her mother before it’s too late.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Endors-toi en tenant ma main gauche

REGULAR.description:
New light is shed on the Euphoria Syndrome after Saiga and Ginza visit an eccentric colleague of Dr. Ryogoku. Meanwhile, Suitengu continues his plan to seize control - by marrying Kagura instead.
Source: crunchyroll

Suitengu’s got everything in place for the wedding: a church, a priest, and a star-studded guest list. The only thing the groom didn’t plan for is the photographer running away with the bride.
Source: crunchyroll

Saiga and Kagura are running blind, with the whole country on the look-out for them. But it’s one mysterious woman with a tragic past who threatens to drag the photographer to his watery doom.
Source: crunchyroll

Suitengu has all he needs to initiate the next phase of his plan: releasing a new drug that simulates Kagura’s kiss and makes the public lose control of their desires.
Source: crunchyroll

Suitengu reflects on the tragic events that shaped him into the man he has become. In recalling the strange, sordid ghosts of his past, the motives for his future endgame come into focus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Reaper and the Nouveau Riche
Un villano rifatto diventa il dio della morte

REGULAR.description:
As the Tennozu Group gets rich off of their new product line, Saiga and Kagura set sail for a fresh start in a new land. But before they can vanish in the wind, they`re dragged back to Tokyo by a powerful new ally.
Source: crunchyroll

Saiga agrees to testify at the Parliamentary hearing if his conditions are met. But after a chance meeting with a young idealist named Joe, Saiga resolves to bring down Suitengu himself.
Source: crunchyroll

As Saiga fights a ruthless Euphoric posing as a friend, Kagura is attacked by the one who was supposed to cure her. Meanwhile, Ginza finds a shocking name on the membership list of Suitengu’s club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グッドバイブレーション

REGULAR.description:
As war breaks out in the skyscrapers of Tokyo between two powerful Euphorics, a depraved killer holds Ginza captive and Prime Minister Kamiya reveals his plans - and true face - to Kagura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le petit déjeuner du premier ministre

REGULAR.description:
As Suitengu continues his assault on the Prime Minister’s mansion, Saiga races to Kagura’s aid. Loyalties are tested and not everyone rises to the occasion.
Source: crunchyroll

With all the country’s leaders locked within the secret club, Japan is without a government. Intent on destroying Suitengu and claiming the spoils, outside forces step into the vacuum and invade.
Source: crunchyroll

The final showdown between Suitengu and Saiga reaches its climax. If Suitengu executes his plan, the streets of Tokyo will be paved with fire and the global economy will be changed forever.
Source: crunchyroll

2843.name: sexual abuse -- TO BE SPLIT AND DELETED

4327.name: be careful what you wish for
